install_msg: Training Manager cog installed. Use [p]tmset to configure channels/role, then [p]tmset post to drop the Start Training panel.
name: TrainingManager
short: Let users request trainings; admins approve/deny; optional reminders at end time.
description: Request/approve training classes with discipline->training menu, per-day fee, optional reference, and reminders. Admins approve/deny in a separate channel; cleaned up with logging.
end_user_data_statement: Stores training requests and reminder schedules (user id, message links, times) until processed. Deletes admin queue messages when processed. No external services.
